resources.string: My name is John Restrepo, I am a dynamic and creative person, accustomed to working under Pressure. I have experience in customer service and very good interpersonal relationships, which makes it easier for me to work in team, which I also enjoy. I am currently a passionate and interested person in the world of technology. In my little experience, I will demonstrate my capabilities, with this type of jobs and thus, to be able to grow in the future both personally and professionally.
